Name: MIDIToKey
About the game: Turn your MIDI keyboard into a computer keyboard You can use MIDI keyboard to type and play games just like using computer keyboard Or turn on [global monitor] to generate music when typing Please note that when your computer is connected to multiple MIDI devices, please select the correct [MIDI port] to listen (Normally, use 0)
